game.name: Elfie: A Sand Plan
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Stereo Sound, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A perfect day at the beach requires sand castles. Help a small ambitious elephant with her ideas in this relaxing geometric puzzle game! Or enjoy building your own!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A perfect day at the beach requires sand castles. Help a small ambitious elephant with her ideas in this relaxing geometric puzzle game! Or enjoy building your own!
